title: Django Authors Panel
summary:
Django Authors Panel by Mark Lavin, Andrew Pinkham, Buddy Lindsey, Peter
Baumgartner, Rikki Endsley and Tracy Osborn

This will be a moderated Q&A with a panel of Django authors. Questions
will be collected in advance from community suggestions. There will also
be time for some questions from the audience.

The panel will include:

Andrew Pinkham - author of "Django Unleashed" Mark Lavin - co-author of
"Lightweight Django" Tracy Osborn - author of "Hello Web App" Peter
Baumgartner - co-author of "High Performance Django"

Help us caption & translate this video!

http://amara.org/v/HHp3/
